attributes.action: If an MP votes for war, they should go to war.
attributes.additional_details:
If a member of Parliment, under pensionable age, votes the country to war.  The said MPs should also go to war.
Of couse not always on the front line, but in some other capacity if they are unable to work on the front line.
If they are unable to go to the said country, they shouldn't be allowed to work, other than MP work, on anything else, but resolving the conflict.
